titleInfo.title: Vue du Caire et mosque Sultan Hussan

mods.abstract: Mosque of the Sultan Hasan from the Citadel at Cairo (A.D. 1362); Mosque-Madrassa (school) with large dome and two minarets, left and right (middle ground); ablaq adorned mosque, double ovoid building, and rows of trees with fountain (foreground); city of Cairo in the background; "Zangaki No 297 Vue du Caire et mosque Sultan Hussan" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
